name: Disturbed (HTML Edition) DEMO
description:
Disturbed is a game with quite the mystery surrounding it. will you be able to solve it? NoBU games, an American game company based in*****. the rest can be found here.  The demo does not have a fleshed out ending. it just ends abruptly. this is normal. this is because the demo is the beginning of the game. which is at the time of this demos release is unfinished.

controls:

A to walk left

d to walk right.

w and space to jump. combine both to double jump.

f to fire laser.

game takes a few seconds to load. give it some time.
